    • Method Detail

      • getState

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getState​(java.lang.String... pathToRepositories)
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the states of the given repositories. It can be: - AHEAD - BEHIND - UP_TO_DATE
        Parameters:
        pathToRepositories - : the paths to all the desired repositories without ".git".
        Returns:
        : a map describe the current state of all given repositories.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - : throws errors

      • pull

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> pull​(java.lang.String... pathToRepositories)
                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Pull changes from the remote. That can fail when user must be authenticated. (Maybe throwing a custom exception like *NotAuthenticatedException* is more explicit than a boolean)
        Parameters:
        pathToRepositories - : the paths to the all the desired repositories without ".git".
        Returns:
        : a map describing the success of the command on each repository.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - : throws errors

                                                      throws java.lang.Exception

        Returns:
        : a map describe the current state of all given repositories.
